g.text: Consume Prepare event message for Payer
Request to retrieve Payer Participant details (if it exists)
Return Participant details if it exists
Return Participant details if it exists
Request to retrieve Payee Participant details (if it exists)
Return Participant details if it exists
Return Participant details if it exists
Request to retrieve Transfer (if it exists)
Validate message signature (to be confirmed in future requirement)
Persist Transfer State (with transferState='RECEIVED' on validation pass)
Route & Publish Position event for Payer
